text: Roméo-Adrien LeBlanc (December 18, 1927June 24, 2009) was a Canadian journalist and politician. He was the 25th Governor General of Canada from 1995 through 1999. LeBlanc died on June 24, 2009 in Grande-Digue, New Brunswick from Alzheimer's disease at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Website of the Governor General of Canada entry for Roméo LeBlanc * Library and Archives Canada entry for Roméo LeBlanc Category:1927 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Canadian journalists Category:Governors-general of Canada Category:Writers from New Brunswick Category:Privy Councillors (Canada) Category:Order of Canada Category:Politicians from New Brunswick
title: Roméo LeBlanc
